body:
When cloning git submodule inside spack with depth=1 (now default), one gets an error like:
```
error: no such remote ref 91fdf75b82b55b25dd9e79cc85e32e6fdb9e4f53
Fetched in submodule path 'cinch', but it did not contain 91fdf75b82b55b25dd9e79cc85e32e6fdb9e4f53. Direct fetching of that commit failed.
```
when the required hash in the submodule isn't the current HEAD of master.
title: Cloning git submodule with depth=1 leads to "no such remote ref" error
